H0.text: Hot plate and stopwatch are the tools used to determine the boiling point of water.

H1.text: Thermometer and balance are the tools used to determine the boiling point of water.

H2.text: Hot plate and thermometer are the tools used to determine the boiling point of water.

H3.text: Balance and graduated cylinder are the tools used to determine the boiling point of water.

A4.text: The glass thermometer is a device that measures temperature.
